description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国吉林省白山市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Baishan City, Jilin Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 1955年至1967年间中华人民共和国山东省地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China, from 1955 to 1967.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间中华人民共和国山东省的政权机关。
description.en: The organ of power in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China, during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间中华人民共和国吉林省的政权机关。
description.en: The organ of power in Jilin Province, People's Republic of China, during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林省委员会
en: Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在吉林省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.
Mu Lin was a native of Fusong, Jilin.

description.zh-cn: 穆林曾任山东省人民委员会副省长。
description.en: Mu Lin served as the Vice Governor of the Shandong Provincial People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 穆林曾任山东省革命委员会副主任。
description.en: Mu Lin served as the Vice Chairman of the Shandong Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 穆林曾任吉林省革命委员会副主任。
description.en: Mu Lin served as the Vice Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 穆林曾任吉林省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Mu Lin served as the Vice Governor of the Jilin Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 穆林是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Mu Lin was a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 穆林曾任中共吉林省委常委。
description.en: Mu Lin served as a Standing Committee Member of the CPC Jilin Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 穆林是第四届全国人大代表。
description.en: Mu Lin was a deputy to the 4th National People's Congress.
